value:
$WmMPID_砂漠ラファエル,ch17_21_Rafael_M_Plegia21,Face|Huh?! What's this? I've never seen
anything like it...$k$pI'll take this one too! And please
gift wrap it for me!$k$p$WmMPID_リーン,ch17_11_Dorothea_FF_Pair,Face|Aha! There you are... Dorothea!
He's over there!$k$p$nMPID_双界ドロテア|What are you doing, Raph?! C'mon!$k$pThe only reason we're in Plegia is for
the mission. Don't forget it!$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠ラファエル,ch17_21_Rafael_M_Plegia21,Face|It's just that the festival stalls are
selling all these things I've never
seen before.$k$pI thought my sis would like it if
I bought her some souvenirs, but
there are so many! I can't stop!$k$p$WmMPID_リーン,ch17_11_Dorothea_FF_Pair,Face|Souvenirs for your sister, eh? A skull
with some...dried grass on it? And a
stuffed scorpion?!$k$p$nMPID_双界ドロテア|That's no way to treat a sister, Raph...$k$pDon't you think she'd be happier
if you got her something cute?$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠ラファエル,ch17_21_Rafael_M_Plegia21,Face|These aren't cute? Aw... I guess
I don't understand what's cute
and what isn't.$k$p$WmMPID_リーン,ch17_11_Dorothea_FF_Pair,Face|All right, I'll help you pick things out.
Just leave it to me! Cuteness is one
of my specialties!$k$p$nMPID_双界ドロテア|Wait—now you're getting involved?$k$p$nMPID_リーン|What's the harm, Dorothea? We can
help him get a gift for his sister...$k$p$nMPID_双界ドロテア|Looks like I have no choice.
I suppose it's fine if it's for
your sister, Raph...$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠ラファエル,ch17_21_Rafael_M_Plegia21,Face|Wow, thank you! I owe you one.
Both of you!$k$p

$WmMPID_双界ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_FF_Pair,Face|How about...a jewel necklace? Some
flower-patterned cloth? Maybe an
incense burner, annnd...candy?$k$p$nMPID_リーン|Perfect! And what about this?
These dried flowers have a lovely
aroma to them.$k$p$nMPID_双界ドロテア|Ooh! That is nice. All right, let's get
that too. That should be just about
enough, don't you think?$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠ラファエル,ch17_21_Rafael_M_Plegia21,Face|Wow! That's a ton of cute stuff!
Thank you both so much!$k$p$WmMPID_双界ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_FF_Pair,Face|You're welcome. I hope they make
your sister happy.$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠ラファエル,ch17_21_Rafael_M_Plegia21,Face|She's going to be overjoyed, I'm sure!$k$pI'm going to send her a letter telling
her about all the things here we've
never seen before... I can't wait!$k$p$WmMPID_リーン,ch17_11_Dorothea_FF_Pair,Face|What a kind older brother. I wish
I'd had a brother like you.$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠ラファエル,ch17_21_Rafael_M_Plegia21,Face|Do you have any brothers, Lene?$k$p$WmMPID_リーン,ch17_11_Dorothea_FF_Pair,Face|I don't. I don't have any family
to speak of...$k$p$nMPID_双界ドロテア|Oh, I'm sorry...$k$p$nMPID_リーン|No, no! I'm sorry. Your situation isn't
much different, I know. I shouldn't
be pitying myself so.$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠ラファエル,ch17_21_Rafael_M_Plegia21,Face|...I'm sorry to hear that, both of you.$k$pSo starting today, I'll be an older
brother for you both!$k$p$WmMPID_リーン,ch17_11_Dorothea_FF_Pair,Face|What?! Aren't we around the
same age?$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠ラファエル,ch17_21_Rafael_M_Plegia21,Face|Don't worry about the details! You
helped me with all this shopping,
so I want to repay you somehow!$k$pI'll buy you whatever you want!$k$p$WmMPID_リーン,ch17_11_Dorothea_FF_Pair,Face|Really?! Well, then I want that hairpin
we walked past a minute ago!$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠ラファエル,ch17_21_Rafael_M_Plegia21,Face|All right, then! I'm on it!$k$p$WmMPID_双界ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_FF_Pair,Face|Goodness, you don't miss a beat,
do you! I'm glad to see your smile
is back, though.$k$p$nMPID_リーン|Hee hee hee... Now it's your turn
to get him to do something for you!$k$p$nMPID_双界ドロテア|So it is, so it is. There are just so
many options. I'll have to think
about this carefully...$k$p
